## Module 1: Getting our hands dirty

Review of data structures with demonstration of data import, processing and exploration.

- Basic io with text, spreadsheet, (SQL?)
- Inspection of data structure
- Overview of tools (e.g. tidyverse, pandas)
- Demo includes processing strings (intro to regex), renaming columns, selecting, filtering

## Module 2: Summarizing and Visualizing Data

- Overview of tools, 
- Presentation best practices
- Demonstration includes grouped summaries, various types of visualizations


## Module 3: Analysis Basics

- Thinking about analysis possibilities
- Demonstration of a analysis deepdive
  - This could just be no more than standard regression with interpretation, prediction/visualization, etc.
